news.title: Car crash victim Alan McCluskey remembered as ‘being made from everything good’, as first of funerals takes place
news.summary: A tractor-led guard of honour and photographs of family and friends represented the life of car crash victim Alan McCluskey at his funeral today, as the 23-year-old was remembered “as being made from everything good”.

news.title: Gardaí believe Enoch Burke is hiding in family home – days after order by High Court returning him to prison for contempt
news.summary: Enoch Burke remained at liberty last night despite multiple attempts by gardaí to execute an order by the High Court returning him to prison for contempt.

news.title: Rúaidhrí O’Connor: Selection shows that Sam Prendergast is Farrell’s main man at No 10
news.summary: Jack Crowley came into this window with all of the momentum, but it’s Sam Prendergast who has the opportunity to close it out as Ireland’s No 10 going into the Six Nations if he can deliver against the Springboks.

news.title: ‘The joy in her eyes chips away at any ache the heart carries’ – Parents of girl stabbed in Parnell Square issue update
news.summary: The family of the young girl who was severely injured in a mass stabbing outside her school on Parnell Square in Dublin have said they will close their GoFundMe page as it approaches the two-year anniversary of the attack.

news.title: Garda arrested after €100,000 drug seizure goes missing is also being investigated over allegedly sharing sensitive information with criminal gang
news.summary: A garda arrested over a missing €100,000 drug seizure is also being investigated for allegedly passing on sensitive information to a criminal gang.

news.title: Pól Ó Conghaile: Are Dublin Airport’s upgraded lounges worth the splurge, and what is included for €29 or €39?
news.summary: Fancy swapping the clatter and queues of a busy terminal for a taste of the high life?

news.title: ‘I’m a Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here!’: Vogue Williams is shaking up the jungle dynamic already as one of two ‘posh’ newcomers
news.summary: The 25th season of I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here! is in full swing. Vogue Williams and Tom Read Wilson arrived in camp on Thursday evening.

news.title: Bill Linnane: I used to stay cosy in the car instead of supporting my son’s soccer team from the sidelines – until my plan backfired
news.summary: This month marked a quarter of a century since an important moment in sports discourse. It was in the first week of November 2000 when Roy Keane took on the prawn sandwich brigade. In the 25 years since Keane launched his tirade, have we really learned all that much about what it means to be a true supporter?

news.title: ‘I’m Uber-mum now – it’s mental’: Karen Koster on home life with husband John, Xposé and why she stepped back from full-time TV work
news.summary: ‘I’m in the taxi phase of parenting. I am ‘Uber mum’,” Karen Koster says. “You go from changing nappies and doing feeds and now I’m like, ‘Who needs to be where? Who’s got tennis? Where are we going for music?’. It is mental. The lifts are crazy.”

news.title: Modern Morals: My son wants his new girlfriend to stay with us over Christmas but we barely know her – how do we handle this?
